scenario_name: Model Inversion Attack on Customer Segmentation Model
description: A malicious actor attempts to reconstruct sensitive customer data from a publicly accessible customer segmentation model deployed by a financial institution.  The attacker leverages a model inversion attack to infer protected attributes such as income levels and credit scores, violating customer privacy regulations.
initial_goal: Analyze the publicly available customer segmentation model and identify potential vulnerabilities.
enterprise_context: Investment/Consumer Banking: A large investment bank has publicly deployed a customer segmentation model via an API for use in certain partner applications.  The model's training data contained sensitive customer information.
